short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension to instantly display related images when you click on any image on Ajio or other websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We enjoy shopping online, but finding all the choices for something you want could be a bit challenging. Install search product by image Chrome extension and it will check every picture you click not only while le you're browsing.  

It doesn't matter whether you are browsing clothes on Ajio or other websites - just click on a picture and it will give you all the similar images in an efficient list. It doesn't take time to compare prices, features, and options, you can do them while browsing a single page. 

How to use: 
 
1. Install the Extension: 
Open the Google Chrome Webstore. 
Look for and put our extension "Product Image by Search" into your browser. 
Press the extension to pin it for immediate access by clicking the puzzle icon on the browser. 
 
2. Navigate to E-commerce Websites: 
Go online and check out the websites of major e-retailers such as Ajio, Myntra, Flipkart or Amazon.in. 
 
3. Use the Extension: 
Open any product page. 
Choose an image from the picture on the page. 
Click the icon of our extension. 
Let us instantly see images similar to the one you picked. 

Key features of search product by image chrome extension 

Instant Image Recognition: The image recognition is done in the blink of an eye without a need for the users to take a picture of the items they want to buy from the e-commerce websites. 

Related Image Display: It will show the list of related images corresponding to the one selected, offering users a chance to explore more. 

Seamless Integration: Merges with major online shopping platforms such as Ajio, Myntra, Flipkart, and Amazon.in. 

Effortless Installation: The extension is added to the browser via the Chrome Web Store with a simple click, which is an installation process without any hassle.
